About Me

A learning developer...

After completing a degree in Marketing and gaining experience in the industry, I discovered my passion for creative UI design and building complex backend software that powers seamless frontend functionality. I actively seek opportunities to continuously learn and develop my skills for the client's and/or team's success. Explore my portfolio and contact me for potential collaborations or exciting job opportunities.
